title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 - Jun 2 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 - Jun 2 2022
description:
Matt Walsh of The Daily Wire joins Clay and Buck to talk about his new film: What Is a Woman? Biden says he wasn't told about the baby formula shortage until April. WH struggles to explain why Biden was clueless about the baby formula shortage. Popcorn shortage looms. CNN tells people to "move away from grass" lawns. WH press secretary calls Kamala Harris "First Lady." Golf etiquette fight breaks out at The Villages. C&B on etiquette issues that drive them nuts.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
